about_the_game:
Ever since Spartans marched to war with pipers by their side, music has been an essential part of military order and morale. Fight the greatest armed struggle of the 20th century with thirteen new song tracks for four nations battling on the Eastern Front.

  • 4 New Soviet Songs: including White Army, Black Baron, Volkhov Drinking Song, Dark is the Night, and The National Anthem of the USSR.
  • 4 New German Songs: including Lili Marlene, Die Wacht am Rhein, Alte Kameraden, and Wir fahren gegen Engeland.
  • 3 New Romanian Songs: including Treceti Batalioane, Pui de lei, and Drum Bun.
  • 2 New Polish Songs: including Pierwsza Pancerna and My, Pierwsza Brygada.
detailed_description:
Ever since Spartans marched to war with pipers by their side, music has been an essential part of military order and morale. Fight the greatest armed struggle of the 20th century with thirteen new song tracks for four nations battling on the Eastern Front.

  • 4 New Soviet Songs: including White Army, Black Baron, Volkhov Drinking Song, Dark is the Night, and The National Anthem of the USSR.
  • 4 New German Songs: including Lili Marlene, Die Wacht am Rhein, Alte Kameraden, and Wir fahren gegen Engeland.
  • 3 New Romanian Songs: including Treceti Batalioane, Pui de lei, and Drum Bun.
  • 2 New Polish Songs: including Pierwsza Pancerna and My, Pierwsza Brygada.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9400 @ 2.66 GHz / AMD Athlon II X4 650 @ 3.20 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 5850 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX470 (1GB VRAM). Latest available proprietary drivers from both manufacturers
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller support: 3-button mouse, keyboard, and speakers are required. / Internet Connection or LAN for multiplayer, Up to 32 other players in multiplayer mode.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 750 @ 2.66 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 955 @ 3.20 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 6950 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX570 (2GB VRAM). Latest available proprietary drivers from both manufacturers
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller support: 3-button mouse, keyboard, and speakers are required. / Internet Connection or LAN for multiplayer, Up to 32 other players in multiplayer mode.
